mobs.long_desc: A pair of bright eyes hovers quickly towards you.
mobs.desc: The small bat seems to be floating on light, gossamer wings. It darts across the room in haphazard and random swoops, looking for anything that gets in its way.

mobs.long_desc: A grotesque beast, standing over a kill, hisses in your direction.
mobs.desc: Before you stands a HUGE furry white hunter that is scantily clothed in a variety of crudely made armor. She is covered from head to toe with scars, bruises, lumps, and bumps most of which came from fights with other Bozaks. After a few moments, your presence is registered and she walks forward, limping slightly.

mobs.long_desc: A small mammal stares carefully at you from the corner of its eyes.
mobs.desc: This four-legged herbivore stands only a few feet tall. It is lightly muscled, and doesn't move very quickly. Its short, bristly fur is an intense olive green, except for on its tail, which is hairless.

mobs.long_desc: A wounded quidnatta stands with its back to the wall, panting quickly.
mobs.desc: This knee-high herbivore has clearly been wounded. Savage cuts mar its intense olive-green coat of short, bristly fur. Its lightly muscled flanks shiver with each ragged breath it takes.

mobs.long_desc: A spiny urchin is attached to the cave wall with sharp barbs here.
mobs.desc: The spiny urchin is covered in sharp needles which it uses both to attach to the cave wall and to protect itself from any unintelligent predators. The urchin moves slowly along the walls in no observable direction or path.

mobs.long_desc: A slimy mass rolls and spins along the cave walls and floors.
mobs.desc: The slimy mass appears to have no true shape. It forms into puddles along the cave floor or balls up to roll along the walls. No matter its shape or position, a single naked eye tracks you completely. There actually appears to be a spark of intelligence in this gelatinous form.

mobs.keywords: bozak hunter huge furry white beast male-bozak
mobs.long_desc: A HUGE furry white beast stands above the others, staring directly into your eyes.
mobs.desc: This Bozak is about twice the size of the other hunters you have seen so far in the caves. He has none of the scars or lumps apparent on the others and they all keep a safe distance from him. He notices your intrusion immediately, and does not even move a muscle.

mobs.long_desc: A large monitor slowly patrols the beach, looking for food.
mobs.desc: This is surely one of the most intimidating reptiles you have ever seen in your life. It is about 5 feet long and covered in thick plated scales. It patrols slowly but once it sees its next meal it turns into a fierce fighting machine. It has extremely strong jaws, which when open expose a slimy, black tongue.

mobs.long_desc: Something on the sands below the water is moving around.
mobs.desc: You see a very large crab with jointed legs, a red-tinted carapace big enough to sleep in, and eyes on stalks.

objects.ground: A necklace comprised of sharp teeth lies forgotten on the ground.

extras.text: When examined closely, it is easy to see the necklace was constructed hastily with clumsy hands.  The teeth vary in shape and size making you wonder if more than bat teeth were used.  Even with all of its flaws, you can tell the necklace held some significance to the owner.

objects.ground: A neckguard constructed of tough stone lies here.

extras.text: The rock neckguard appears to be chipped and sculpted from a single large stone.  Previously constructed for the huge Bozaks, it is almost too large for your neck.  The neckguard is sturdy enough to withstand almost any attack.

objects.ground: A crude buckler made of the skins of strange animals is here.

extras.text: The buckler is made from the skins of multiple quidnattas, each held together by the barbs of some strange urchin.  The back of the shield is supported by a conglomeration of wood and stone structures.  The shield is extremely large and you can hardly see over it.

objects.ground: An awkward spear made for a huge being lies here.

extras.text: The giant wooden spear is definitely made for an extremely strong predator. It is crudely made and almost dull, but its sheer size and weight make it a lethal weapon.  The entire length of the spear is streaked from its last kill.

objects.ground: A barely visible circle of smooth coral lies on the ground.

extras.text: The coral ring seems totally flawless.  It is made of the finest coral you have ever seen, and fades from a light pink on one side to white on the other.  It is smoothed completely and coated with a clear substance so that it is not the least bit abrasive.

objects.ground: A clear pool of water glistens before you.

extras.text: The pool is fed by the occasional drip of water from the ceiling. The entire edge of the pool is surrounded with the bones of recent kills, but the water itself seems perfectly clean and clear. The inhabitants of the cave must take extremely good care of this water supply.

objects.ground: A large runed arch rises from the rocks.

extras.text: The giant archway must weigh tons and you have a hard time imaging a being large or strong enough to create such a heavy structure. It dominates this part of the cavern and dwarf the huts scattered about it.

objects.ground: A large archway made of stone stands buried in the moss.

extras.text: This giant stone structure has been here for mellinia yet no one knows how it got here.  It pulsates with energy and within the arch there is a reflective magical surface that undulates like quicksilver. Perhaps you should enter it. [Type enter portal]

objects.ground: A large stone archway has been recently unearthed.
A black shadow is here, darkening the area around it.

extras.text: As your eyes focus on the darkness, it resolves itself into a shape: a set of fine plate armor.  Looking closer, it seems more and more solid the closer you look, until you can make out even the tiny details of its forging: flame marks, tiny rivulets of a darker black, and almost imperceptible silver runes which cover it and catch what light escapes the deep shadows.  Power pulses from it, and it seems quite ancient.

rooms.name: A Wide Cave in the Cliff Wall
rooms.description: The cold dark rock wall gives way into an odd tear in its surface.  This part of the caverns seems oddly formed compared to the rest of the lava formations.  The rock is eroded and there is no smell of sulfur here.  There is a light trickle of water under your feet and a wind is blowing as well.  The passage continues into the wall south and into dark open air to the north.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: An Opening in the Rock
rooms.description: This passage is narrow and barely passable.  Formations of rock caused by eons of dripping water are all around.  Some glow strangely in the light you have.  The rock is black and volcanic in nature but has withered away to make a small crawlspace here.  The water passes through here at a light trickle and the sound of it flowing is noticeable.  The tunnel opens more to the north and there is a steep climb upward.

Up.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Tight Squeeze
rooms.description: The rocks are closing in and are very wet and slippery.  The light seems to confuse you more as the walls reflect it in an odd manner.  The black volcanic rock has ground to a sand on the bottom of the squeeze.  The wind howls loudly here as it's funneled into the squeeze.  There is a hole to the south into the wind and a slide down the rock below.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: An Opening in the Rock
rooms.description: The tunnel is very wide and open.  A cavern of open and fresh air.  A light breeze blows in from the east and most of the rocks are dry and cold.  There is an exit to the east and a crawlspace that the wind is flowing into to the north.

East.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: An Opening in the Rock
rooms.description: The tunnel is very wide and open.  A cavern of open and fresh air.  A light breeze blows in from above as the cavern inclines abruptly.  Most of the rocks are dry and cold but you notice a small stream of water flowing down the incline.  The cavern continues west as well.

Up.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Wide Climbing Cavern
rooms.description: The cold dark rock wall grows colder as you climb.  The cavern is large and you can barely see the top behind you.  A gentle breeze flows in from above and water is everywhere making the rocks slippery and difficult to grasp.  The rocks continue downward and steeply to the north.

North.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Wide Climbing Cavern
rooms.description: The cold dark rock wall grows colder as you climb.  The cavern is large and you can barely see the top behind you.  A gentle breeze flows in from above and water is everywhere making the rocks slippery and difficult to grasp.  The rocks continue upward and steeply to the south.

Up.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Wide Climbing Cavern
rooms.description: On the edge of a cliff the footing is difficult as water flows over the edge and between sharp rocks that form a passage downward.  The top of the cavern is within a stones throw and the breeze is light.  The cavern continues to the south as well.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Wide Cavern
rooms.description: The slope of the climb is gently to the south here.  A small channel of water flows through the center of the cavern.  The top of the cavern is within a stones throw and the breeze is light.  The cavern continues for miles to the north and south.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Wide Climbing Cavern
rooms.description: The slope of the climb is gently to the south here.  A small channel of water flows through the center of the cavern.  The top of the cavern is within a stones throw and the breeze is light.  The cavern continues for miles to the north and ends abruptly to the south.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Crawlspace
rooms.description: A cavern open to the north, formed by the flow of water down its expanse. Rock formations caused by the water flow are everywhere and the top of the cavern is low.  It does extend out of site to the south and there seems to be a small hole in the rocks to the west from where the water is flowing.

West.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Cramped Crawlspace
rooms.description: Water is everywhere and it makes passage difficult.  The rocks are very cold and tight.  The wind here is loud as it howls through this tiny tunnel.  Water flows slightly downward to the east and the wind is coming from the north.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Cramped Crawlspace
rooms.description: Water is everywhere and it makes passage difficult.  The rocks are very cold and tight.  The wind here is loud as it howls through this tiny tunnel.  Water flows slightly downward to the south and the wind is coming from the north.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Massive Cavern
rooms.description: The cavern walls come to a close to the west and expand outward beyond the horizon to the east and north.  The cavern is huge and the top is out of sight of your light.  The air is fresh and the wind flows from the south.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles to the south and east over the horizon.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Massive Cavern
rooms.description: The cavern walls come to a close to the south and expand outward beyond the horizon in every direction.  The cavern is huge and the top is out of sight of your light.  The air is fresh and the wind flows from the south.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles over the horizon.  There is a channel of water flowing to the north into a hole in the rocks.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

West.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Massive Cavern
rooms.description: The cavern walls come to a close to the east and expand outward beyond the horizon to the west and south.  The cavern is huge and the top is out of sight of your light.  The air is fresh and the wind flows from the south.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles over the horizon.

rooms.name: A Massive Cavern
rooms.description: The cavern walls come to a close to the west and expand outward beyond the horizon to the east and south.  The cavern is huge and the top is out of sight of your light.  The air is fresh and the wind flows from the south and sometimes east.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles over the horizon.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Pool of Water
rooms.description: The cavern is huge and the top can be seen as you take in the view of the size of it all.  The largest mountains in the realm could fit easily into this place.  Thousands of feet upward you notice the top of the cavern as a small amount of light seems to come in through small cracks that must tunnel to the surface.  The wind here is a gentle mixture of flowing upward and downward as though the many holes in the ceiling are fighting for dominance.  The air is fresh and blows ripples into a clear pool of water that feeds a stream flowing to the south down the gradual slope.  There is enough light here to support plant life and large trees can be seen scattered about in a light underbrush. An arch of stone sits to the east of the great pool surrounded by large thatch huts.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles over the horizon in every direction.

rooms.name: A Massive Cavern
rooms.description: The cavern walls come to a close to the east and expand outward beyond the horizon to the west, north and south.  The cavern is huge and the top is out of sight of your light.  The air is fresh and the wind flows from the east and sometimes south.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles over the horizon.

rooms.name: A Massive Cavern
rooms.description: The cavern walls come to a close to the east and expand outward beyond the horizon to the north and east.  The cavern is huge and the top is out of sight of your light.  The air is fresh and the wind flows from in from above.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles over the horizon.

Up.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: A Massive Cavern
rooms.description: The cavern walls come to a close to the south and expand outward beyond the horizon to the west, north and east.  The cavern is huge and the top is out of sight of your light.  The air is fresh and the wind flows from the west and sometimes north.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles over the horizon.

rooms.name: A Massive Cavern
rooms.description: The cavern walls come to a close to the east and south.  Some small holes can be seen in the cavern wall but they are much to small to traverse.  The walls of this place expand outward beyond the horizon to the west and north. The cavern is huge and the top is out of sight of your light.  The air is fresh and the wind flows from the west.  The rocky surface of the bottom of the cavern extends miles over the horizon.

rooms.name: An unfinished room
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.

rooms.name: Above the Rocks
rooms.description: In the air you glide near the walls of a huge cavern that opens to the north and east.  Rock formations along the top of the cavern are moist and damp. The bottom of the cavern is out of the range of your light and a strong breeze nudges you to levitate southward.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: An Opening in the Rock
rooms.description: The cold dark rock wall gives way into an odd tear in its surface.  This part of the caverns seems oddly formed compared to the rest of the formations. The rocks erode as if water once flowed upward.  The tunnel opens to the north and the wind blows warmly against the dry rocks from above.  The sound of an ocean can be heard.

Up.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

rooms.name: In the Middle of a Stone Column
rooms.description: The walls of this tunnel are made of small stones masoned together and they circle you.  There is moss and lichen covering the stones as well.  The tunnel continues downward into the darkness and upward into the open air.

Up.description: You see the sky and notice dense vines growing down the walls of the well.  A warm salty breeze blows in your face.

Down.description: The wind blows by you into the cold darkness.

rooms.name: Jungle
rooms.description: The hot steamy air of the jungle oppresses you and lovingly supports dense, viney vegetation and huge tropical trees.  There is a large stone structure that is enveloped by the plants.  It seems to be howling like the wind at times.  The path in the sand leads back to the south.

South.description: A salty breeze blows in your face.

Down.description: The well leads down out of sight into the darkness.  The wind flows into it as though there would be another side.

extras.text: The idol is about 30 feet high and resembles a druid in a casting pose.  Beneath the staff of the druid is a circle of stones resembling a well.
This structure is about three feet high and six feet across and the wind seems to flow down into it.  No water has been pulled from here in recent years.

rooms.name: Sand Between the Jetty
rooms.description: The ocean crashes against rocks to the southwest.  White sand dominates the beach here.  On higher ground to the north and west, stunted pines grow. Beyond the pines is a dark forest.  The beach continues to the east.

rooms.name: Beach
rooms.description: There is a fine white sand covering the entire area.  The sand leads to the edge of a lagoon of clear blue water that colors the sand an aqua hue beneath it.  The water of the lagoon gently laps waves of the water against the shore and extends only a few hundred feet to rest against some high cliff walls to the south and east.  Dense jungle comes close to the waterline providing shade for much of the beach.  An opening in the jungle leads north on a path in the sand.  The beach continues to the east and west.  The waters of the lagoon invite you to the south.

rooms.name: Beach
rooms.description: There is a fine white sand covering the entire area.  The sand leads to the edge of a lagoon of clear blue water that colors the sand an aqua hue beneath it.  The water of the lagoon gently laps waves of the water against the shore and extends only a few hundred feet to rest against some high cliff walls to the south and east.  Dense jungle comes close to the waterline providing shade for much of the beach.  The beach continues to the west and a cliff blocks your passage to the east.  The waters of the lagoon invite you to the south.

rooms.name: On the Jetty
rooms.description: There are more rocks here and you can see an ocean crashing against rocks to the southwest.  The white sand continues to dominate between the rocks and water from a lagoon above flows between the rocks to the south ending in a steep fall.  The heat of this tropical land is bearable but just barely... The rocks decline downward to the sea and incline upward to the east.

rooms.name: On the Jetty
rooms.description: There are more rocks here and you can see an ocean crashing against rocks to the southwest.  The white sand continues to dominate between the rocks and water from a lagoon above flows between the rocks to the south.  The heat of this tropical land is bearable but just barely...  The rocks decline westward to the sea and incline upward to the north.

rooms.name: Floating in the Lagoon
rooms.description: The blue waters of the lagoon are bright and clear as the bottom of the lagoon is just five feet below the surface.  The bright white sands churn slightly as water is pressed upward from the rocks beneath the surface.  The springs seem to be an odd mixture of fresh and salt water.  There is a large vine covered cliff protecting this natural spring lagoon from the elements to the south and east.  The waters of the lagoon flow off between some rocks to the west.  The beach of the lagoon is to the north.

rooms.name: Floating in the Lagoon
rooms.description: The blue waters of the lagoon are bright and clear as the bottom of the lagoon is just five feet below the surface.  The bright white sands churn slightly as water is pressed upward from the rocks beneath the surface.  The springs seem to be an odd mixture of fresh and salt water.  There is a large vine covered cliff protecting this natural spring lagoon from the elements to the south and east.  The waters of the lagoon flow off between some rocks to the west.  The beach of the lagoon is to the north.

rooms.name: On the Jetty
rooms.description: There are more rocks here and you can see an ocean crashing against rocks to the southwest.  The white sand continues to dominate between the rocks and water from a large stream crashes over the top of some tall rocks from above forming a spray like falls that is difficult to distinguish from the water breaking upon the jetty itself.  The heat of this tropical land is bearable but just barely...  The rocks decline westward to the sea and incline upward.

rooms.name: On the Jetty
rooms.description: There are more rocks here giving you shelter from the sea and a safe footing.  White sands seem to permeate between the rocks and a falls can be seen to the northeast mixing with the spray of seawater crashing upon the rocks.  The heat of this tropical land is bearable but just barely...  The rocks incline eastward and the sea lies to the south.
